A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Yeah just saw it\, not a fan of this new canon.

And seeing as there already 20+ novels\, 19+ comic series\, 3 movies\, and 2 games (why the hell did they gave EA rights to the games is beyond me.) for this new Canon. 80% which I see/read. Say what you want\, but can't say I didn't give it a try. Think that more than enough to judge if it something I'll like it or not. And guess what like old EU was better this\, grow up with it.

For those that like the new canon\, glad for you. You all have years for new stuff to look forward to. As for me I'll go back reread\, watch and play the old stuff. Still love Star Wars\, but not the new canon.
